en.slide1_1: Hey! I'm Pebbles the potion master. You and me we'll be preparing some nice potions.
en.slide1_2: But first, we need to know some useful concepts.
en.slide1_3: All matter is made from atoms. Individual atoms can combine with other atoms to form molecules.
en.slide1_4: Everything we can see and touch is made up of matter. Matter exists in three main forms: solids, liquids, and gases.
en.slide1_5: There's also the plasma state and has certain properties that other states does not have.
en.slide1_6: Every state of matter has different properties.
en.slide1_7: Let's see if we can use some of the matter properties to create some potions.
en.slide2_1: In a liquid, particles of matter move relative to one another but remain in contact.
en.slide2_2: The movement of the particles causes the liquid to be variable in shape.
en.slide2_3: Liquids will flow and fill the lowest portion of a container, taking on the shape of the container but not changing in volume.
en.tutorial_0: Redirect the liquid through the pipes to fill the glass container!
en.tutorial_2: 2- Click on a tile to put the selected pipe on top of it
en.tutorial_3: 3- You can click on placed tiles to rotate them
en.tutorial_4: 4- Pipes with a grating on top can't be rotated
en.tutorial_5: 5- Click on the play button to run the liquid
en.tutorial_6: 6- Wait until the container is filled with the fluid
